questions.location: Where is the pain located? (upper, lower, right, left, all over)
questions.onset: When did the pain start? Was it sudden or gradual?
questions.severity: On a scale of 1-10, how severe is the pain?
questions.associated_symptoms: Do you have vomiting, fever, inability to pass gas, blood in stool?
questions.last_bowel_movement: When was your last bowel movement?
questions.medical_history: Do you have any history of abdominal surgery, ulcers, or abdominal aortic aneurysm?

triage_rules.expression: 'sudden' in str(onset).lower() and int(severity) >= 8 and 'aneurysm' in str(medical_history).lower()
triage_rules.reason: Severe sudden abdominal pain with AAA history - Possible rupture - Immediate Emergency Care Required

triage_rules.expression: int(severity) >= 8 and ('blood' in str(associated_symptoms).lower() or 'vomit' in str(associated_symptoms).lower())
triage_rules.reason: Severe abdominal pain with GI bleeding - Emergency evaluation needed
